author: "Capreolus, Jean, approximately 1380-1444"
title: "Clarissimi sacre theologie doctoris fratris Pauli (Barbo) Soncinatis, vite regularis Ordinis Predicatorum, divinum epitoma questionum in quatuor libros Sententiarum a principe thomistarum Joanne Capreolo, tholosano, disputatarum. His additis que idem mort"
